Package ui

Class Administration

java.lang.Object
ui.Administration
public class Administration extends Object
This class is where the main functional requirements of the integrator are executed

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    approbationStage()
    This method shows that the stage has been approved, by instantiating a calendar variable to store the actual end date of the stage.
    void
    assingDate()
    This control method assigns the duration of months of each stage going through a cycle stores them in an array of 6, with the goal of sending it to the class projectSQA and this assigns the start and end dates planned for each stage of the project
    void
    capsuleApproval()
    view method that looks for the capsules to approve them, and prints if it exists approved otherwise
    String[]
    capsuleHashtag(String description, String[] wordKey)
    This method searches for words or text strings that contain '#' and stores them in an array as keywords for each capsule, to subsequently use another method to search for them.

    Finds the free position of an array

    This view method has the function of selecting the stage for the purpose of viewing the lessons of it.

    Runs the main sismeta menu, and returns a boolean yes to enter the project menu if found

    This view method registers the capsules to send them to the controller method and thus create the project's capsules of its current stage.

    This control method is responsible for registering the projects, entering the name and the amount of investment.
    boolean

    This control method searches for a project and performs the actions shown in the menuProject on the current project if found.

    Control/View method that verifies if the input is a number, and can also be used to verify options with necessary restrictions.

      Builder Method of the class Administration

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method of the application that starts the program and receives command line arguments.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments to be processed by the application.

    • menuProject

      public void menuProject()
      View method that shows the Options from the projects menu such as registering capsules or approving stages

    • principalExecution

      public boolean principalExecution(int option)
      Runs the main sismeta menu, and returns a boolean yes to enter the project menu if found
      Parameters:
      option - the option chosen by the user
      Returns:
      if true, you can enter the project menu otherwise it stays the same

    • projectExecution

      public void projectExecution(int option)
      This method executes the project menu options, either register capsules, approve capsules or approve stages

    • lines

      public static void lines()
      decoration of lines for the terminal

    • registerProject

      public void registerProject()
      This control method is responsible for registering the projects, entering the name and the amount of investment. In order to create a project object by calling the controller

    • assingDate

      public void assingDate()
      This control method assigns the duration of months of each stage going through a cycle stores them in an array of 6, with the goal of sending it to the class projectSQA and this assigns the start and end dates planned for each stage of the project

    • searchProject

      public boolean searchProject()
      This control method searches for a project and performs the actions shown in the menuProject on the current project if found.
      Returns:
      a boolean, true if found, false otherwise

    • publishCapsules

      public void publishCapsules()
      Displays the URL of the published capsules

    • validateDouble

      public double validateDouble()
      Control/View method that verifies if the input is a number, and can also be used to verify options with necessary restrictions.
      Returns:
      The validated double value

    • read

      public String read(Scanner scanner)
      Control method used to verify text strings with spaces for any issues. This was implemented to prevent reading problems. 😃
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner object
      Returns:
      Returns the entire line as a String

    • approbationStage

      public void approbationStage()
      This method shows that the stage has been approved, by instantiating a calendar variable to store the actual end date of the stage.

    • registerCapsule

      public void registerCapsule()
      This view method registers the capsules to send them to the controller method and thus create the project's capsules of its current stage. The controller returns whether it was saved or not.

    • capsuleHashtag

      public String[] capsuleHashtag(String description, String[] wordKey)
      This method searches for words or text strings that contain '#' and stores them in an array as keywords for each capsule, to subsequently use another method to search for them. At the moment it will only extract 10 capsules in description and lesson
      Parameters:
      description - the variable that contains the text with the '#'
      wordKey - the array that will store the '#'
      Returns:
      the array with the found keywords

    • getFirstValidPosition

      public int getFirstValidPosition(String[] array)
      Finds the free position of an array
      Parameters:
      array - Array to search for free space
      Returns:
      Returns the space if found, -1 otherwise.

    • capsuleApproval

      public void capsuleApproval()
      view method that looks for the capsules to approve them, and prints if it exists approved otherwise

    • lessonStage

      public void lessonStage(int execution)
      This view method has the function of selecting the stage for the purpose of viewing the lessons of it. Either of all the projects (execution==1) or of the project that the user is presenting (execution==2). To finally present the lessons of the chosen stage
      Parameters:
      execution - Number 1 or 2
